item.title: by: Ryan Tomayko
item.description: Ha! I got so use to Safari's RSS button in the URL bar that I completeley forgot to add an RSS badge to the site. Thanks for the note, Josh.
item.content:encoded: Ha! I got so use to Safari’s RSS button in the URL bar that I completeley forgot to add an RSS badge to the site. Thanks for the note, Josh.

item.title: by: Josh Rice
item.description: I noticed that the article comments have an RSS feed, but how about an RSS feed for the main page?
item.content:encoded: I noticed that the article comments have an RSS feed, but how about an RSS feed for the main page?
